languages.text: Висирь Кровавой паутины Кибелла повела свой культ старыми путями и сохранила верность традициям. Служители Кровавой паутины как и прежде отдавались аскезе и несли смерть тем, на кого указывал Неумирающий. Однако ничто не неизменно, и великое событие потрясло Кровавую паутину — была обнаружена и чудесно возвращена одна из карт Таро Императора, некогда утраченная святыня. Висирь свершила расклад, и Император указал ей новую цель — собрать воедино благословенную колоду. Лишь в полноте своей могла она открыть великое и темное будущее, что ждало Простор Коронус. Кровавая паутины прочла знамение, и священный поиск был начат.

Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web guided her cult along its old paths and remained faithful to tradition. As before, Bloodspun Web cultists led ascetic lives and brought death to those who had been marked by the Undying One. However, nothing is unchanging. A momentous event profoundly impacted the Bloodspun Web: the discovery and miraculous return of a lost relic, a card from the Emperor's Tarot. The Vizsier performed a reading, and the Emperor showed her a new goal: to put the blessed deck back together. Only in its entirety could it reveal the great and dark future that awaited the Koronus Expanse. The Bloodspun Web read the portents, and the holy search commenced.
languages.original_text: Висирь Кровавой паутины Кибелла повела свой культ старыми путями и сохранила верность традициям. traits.locale_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web guided her cult along its old paths and remained faithful to tradition. As before, Bloodspun Web cultists led ascetic lives and brought death to those who had been marked by the Undying One. However, nothing is unchanging. A momentous event profoundly impacted the Bloodspun Web: the discovery and miraculous return of a lost relic, a card from the Emperor's Tarot. The Vizsier performed a reading, and the Emperor showed her a new goal: to put the blessed deck back together. Only in its entirety could it reveal the great and dark future that awaited the Koronus Expanse. The Bloodspun Web read the portents, and the holy search commenced.

A momentous event profoundly impacted the Bloodspun Web: the discovery and miraculous return of a lost relic, a card from the Emperor's Tarot. The Vizsier made a reading, and the Emperor showed her a new goal: to put the blessed deck back together. Only in its entirety could it reveal the great and dark future that awaited the Koronus Expanse. The Bloodspun Web read the portents, and the holy search commenced.

languages.text: Wesir Kibellah vom Blutgesponnenen Netz führte ihren Kult auf seinen alten Wegen und wahrte seine Traditionen. Die Kultisten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes brachten auch weiterhin all jenen den Tod, die vom Todlosen ausersehen waren. Allerdings, bleibt nichts wie es ist. Ein folgenreicher Moment hatte enorme Auswirkungen auf das Blutgesponnene Netz. Die Entdeckung und wundersame Rückkehr einer verlorenen Reliquie, einer Karte aus dem Tarot des Imperators. Der Wesir führte eine Lesung durch und der Imperator zeigte ihr ein neues Ziel: das gesegnete Kartenspiel wieder zu vervollständigen. Nur in seiner Gesamtheit konnte es die grandiose und dunkle Zukunft offenbaren, die der Koronus-Ausdehnung bevorstand. Das Blutgesponnene Netz deutete die Omen und die heilige Suche begann.

languages.text: Fidèle à la tradition, la vizir Kibellah de la Toile de Sang reprit les rênes de son culte dans la droite lignée de ses principes ancestraux. Ses disciples continuèrent à mener une vie d'ascètes et à donner la mort à tous ceux qui leur avaient été désignés par l'Immortel. Cependant, rien n'est véritablement immuable, et un événement majeur survint qui ébranla la Toile de Sang jusque dans ses fondations : la découverte et la récupération miraculeuse d'une relique perdue, une carte du tarot de l'Empereur. La vizir se livra alors à un rituel divinatoire au cours duquel un nouvel objectif lui fut révélé : rassembler tous les arcanes de Son jeu sacré. Une fois au complet, il pourrait enfin lui divulguer l'avenir aussi vaste qu'obscur qui attendait les Étendues de Koronus. La Toile de Sang interpréta les présages, et c'est ainsi que débuta son auguste quête.

languages.text: La Visir Kibellah de la Red Sanguinolenta guio a su culto por los antiguos caminos y se mantuvo fiel a la tradición. Como hasta entonces, los cultistas de la Red Sanguinolenta se dedicaron al ascetismo y a traer la muerte a aquellos marcados por el Inmortal. Sin embargo, nada es inmutable. Un acontecimiento monumental tuvo un gran efecto sobre la Red Sanguinolenta: el descubrimiento y la milagrosa recuperación de una reliquia perdida, una carta del Tarot del Emperador. La Visir hizo una nueva lectura y el Emperador le encomendó una nueva misión: volver a reunir la bendita baraja. Solo cuando estuviera completa podría revelar el grandioso y siniestro futuro que esperaba a la Extensión de Koronus. La Red Sanguinolenta, haciendo caso a estos portentos, comenzó su sagrada búsqueda.

languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブのヴィジール・キベラは、教団を従来の道に沿って導き、伝統に忠実であり続けた。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの教団は、かつてと変わらず禁欲的な生活を送り、不死の者が刻印した者たちに死をもたらした。しかし、不変のものなどあり得ない。ある重大な事件がブラッドスパン・ウェブに大きな影響を与えたのだ。失われた聖遺物、皇帝陛下の占い札が発見され、奇跡的にも戻ってきたのだ。ヴィジールがそれを読み解くと、皇帝は「祝福されたデッキを元通りにする」という新たな目標を彼女に示した。コロヌス・エクスパンスを待ち受ける暗黒の未来を見通せるのは、その全体像を通してのみである。ブラッドスパン・ウェブはその予兆を読み取り、新たな聖なる探索が始まった。
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web guided her cult along its old paths and remained faithful to tradition. As before, Bloodspun Web cultists led ascetic lives and brought death to those who had been marked by the Undying One. However, nothing is unchanging. A momentous event profoundly impacted the Bloodspun Web: the discovery and miraculous return of a lost relic, a card from the Emperor's Tarot. The Vizsier performed a reading, and the Emperor showed her a new goal: to put the blessed deck back together. Only in its entirety could it reveal the great and dark future that awaited the Koronus Expanse. The Bloodspun Web read the portents, and the holy search commenced.

languages.text: 织血罗网的宿老带领着她的教派，沿着古老的道路前进，保持着传统的做派。织血罗网的信徒与之前一样，过着苦行僧般的生活，将死亡带给那些被不死之神烙下印记的人们。然而，万事万物都会变化，织血罗网也不例外。织血罗网后来发生了一件大事，产生了重要的影响：某件早已遗落的圣物被奇迹般地发现、寻回，那是帝皇的其中一张塔罗牌。宿老绮贝菈进行了占卜，看到了帝皇为她指明的全新目标——将整副受到祝福的塔罗牌重新收集起来，因为只有集齐所有的圣牌，才能真正揭示科罗努斯扩区伟大而黑暗的未来。织血罗网解读了帝皇的预言，神圣的搜寻开始了。
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web guided her cult along its old paths and remained faithful to tradition. As before, Bloodspun Web cultists led ascetic lives and brought death to those who had been marked by the Undying One. However, nothing is unchanging. languages.text: Kanipi Ağı Veziri Kibellah, tarikatına eski yollarda kılavuzluk ederek geleneklere sadık kaldı. Kanipi Ağı tarikatçıları, eskisi gibi çileci yaşamlar sürerek Ölmeyen tarafından işaretlenenlere ölüm getirdiler. Ancak hayatta değişmeyen bir şey yoktur. Mühim bir olay, Kanipi Ağı'na derinlemesine etki etti. Yitip gitmiş bir yadigârın, İmparator'un Tarotu'ndan bir kart keşfedilip mucizevi bir şekilde geri alındı. Vezir, bir okuma gerçekleştirdi. İmparator da ona yeni bir gaye gösterdi. Kutsanmış desteyi yeniden toplaması gerekiyordu. Yalnızca tamamı bir araya gelirse Koronus Enginliği'ni bekleyen muazzam, karanlık geleceği açığa çıkarabilirdi. Kanipi Ağı'nın alametleri okumasıyla birlikte kutsal arayış başladı.
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web guided her cult along its old paths and remained faithful to tradition. As before, Bloodspun Web cultists led ascetic lives and brought death to those who had been marked by the Undying One. However, nothing is unchanging. The Vizsier performed a reading, and the Emperor showed her a new goal: to put the blessed deck back together. Only in its entirety could it reveal the great and dark future that awaited the Koronus Expanse. The Bloodspun Web read the portents, and the holy search commenced.
